availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh Taylor Brent (Bourbon County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Charles D. Brent and Susan Taylor Brent. Married to Caroline Russel Brent in Bourbon County, Kentucky on June 29, 1855. Father of Charles Brent, Susan Brent, and Russell Brent. Merchant in Bourbon County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned five enslaved individuals in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, p. 488.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, p. 2.
